tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"穿刺","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"沿前方 3 条相距 0.2 格的并行线最多 30 格持续召唤尖刺，","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"受击者获得 5 秒挖掘疲劳I & 缓慢I。","color":"gray","italic":false}','""','{"text":"若穿刺后移开启：","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"释放者向后位移 1.2 格，1 秒内避免摔伤。","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"若卡入墙体且受到伤害，将返回至原来的位置。","color":"gray","italic":false}','""','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 次","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"     ⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"4 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"6 点/次     ","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"6 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
